website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy Book beats the Surface on value by including a keyboard cover and stylus in the box, but the Surface's design is still much more refined.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy Book has an excellent screen, strong performance and long battery life
A keyboard cover and stylus are both included
cons: It can get hot if multitasking for a long time
The keyboard case is wobbly if not sitting on a sturdy surface
The kickstand situation isn't as solid as the Surface's

customer_reviews.title: Less than 3 months old.  Will not charge.
customer_reviews.text: This won't charge! It says "Plugged in, not charging" or "discharging." Utterly ridiculous. Update >> I forgot I had that issue of the charging. I bought aftermarket adapter and cable and it fixed the issue. However, now that the device is 1.5 years old, it now had a defect in the screen. There is a fairly-wide vertical strip that is "yellowish" in color. it won't go away. The computer is just not good.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Honest

customer_reviews.title: Excellent with some weakness...
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed. It's lightweight and boy what a brilliant AMOLED display. That alone is worth it. It's pretty speedy and no hiccups, so far. The internal fan does become audible at times, which is a bit concerning. The other weakness is the keyboard... The keys are not the most responsive so you end up with typos, which is annoying when it's messing up with your passwords... Otherwise, it's a very solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: Manhattan Dweller

customer_reviews.title: No USB port
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Very nice and everything came without a scratch. The only thing I did not like was that it had no usb port but everything else was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Thony

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet/laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet/Laptop for travel, screen started flickering with brightness at zero about a month after purchase. percentage of brightness needed to prevent flickering keeps rising. It's now up to 18 percent brightness. Very inconvenient when trying to wind down at night.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Lane

customer_reviews.title: Simply OUTSTANDING!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the wife's birthday. She uses it primarily for reading and she absolutely LOVES IT. It is intuitive, versatile, and fast. I highly recommend this tablet-PC for home, home office, or business use.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado

customer_reviews.title: FLAWLESS
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly with everything, super smooth, super fast. Very easy to use, altough if you only need it as a tablet i recommend buying another case without a keyboard for easier use, maybe for plane of car trips
customer_reviews.author: sergio solari

customer_reviews.title: WARNING.  DON'T BUT THIS POS !!
customer_reviews.text: this thing is junk. I thought it would be a great piece of equipment but the hyperlinks didnt work at all. I attempted to work it out with the seller but they lied and said it worked just fine. so I had to get Amazon involved. don't buy this POS, especially from a lying dealer !!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Henick

customer_reviews.title: Very good tablet very good delivery periode that took only 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good tablet very good delivery periode that took only 2 days from usa to kuwait the product as described exactly even better, good seller Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ayman Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have for a long time been a great Samsung lover, this like my past tablets is a great Buy. I suggest you do a lot of research on YouTube and different things to find out what works best for you but this product works great for me lots of storage room on it long life battery very fast charging I got the one with 8 gigs of RAM. I strongly recommended but it is all products I do suggest reviewing it researching it making sure that it is what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous product. It does all it says it does. It is fast responding. It looks nice, it works nice. No issues at all. The only sometimes almost annoying thing is that whenever I use it people around me come and ask me what this is, where I got it from, how much it cost, and even worse, they want to try it out! (Samsung does not sell it in the country I live). Really great product. I would buy it again and can recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs a USB port.
customer_reviews.text: This computer is okay, but could be better. There is no USB port, which is why I can't give it more stars. Also, the battery life is less than ideal.
customer_reviews.author: T. White

customer_reviews.title: Nice laptop/tablet, but stopped working after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Battery charges very slowly with the original charger, and wasn't any better with a different charger. Takes days to charge up to 75%, drains very quickly even when plugged into the charger. Getting very little help from Samsung support...
customer_reviews.author: Atul Sudhalkar

customer_reviews.title: Great Surface replacement
customer_reviews.text: This product is just as good as the Microsoft Surface if not a little better .. the price was half the price of the Surface.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: works great fully satisfied
customer_reviews.text: yet to use all the available features but very happy indeed with this purchase. the fact that key board has adequately spaced keys to accommodate my big hands and lights up for each key makes it most satisfying in use with low lighting situation.
customer_reviews.author: Romz T Collins

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this product that we ordered another one. The screen quality is amazing. A keyboard cover is included which is very convenient. Works perfectly well.. battery life depends on the usage and so far no issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Learning how to use this.
customer_reviews.text: I am appreciating this more and more as I take the time to learn how to use this. Right now I am really pleased with the capability to synch with your Galaxy phone via Samsung Flow. You can actually use the touch screen and operate the screen like you are actually using your phone. What I am working on now is the transition between tablet/touchscreen/S pen. It's not as fluid for me as I hoped but still going to keep trying and getting used to it. Will return for additional feedback. I like the portability and battery life. This fits in my purse and I no longer carry a heavy bag to class.
customer_reviews.author: agarner1001

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable WI-FI.
customer_reviews.text: WI-FI comes and goes intermittently. NOT GOOD. Unreliable WI-FI. See other reviews that show this is not unique to me. I would NOT buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't ask for more. My daughter loves it. I have one too.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Performance sucks
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is poor and the device heats up really fast. Can barely handle word processing. The only good thing is the display, but the battery doesn't last long enough for you to enjoy it :(
customer_reviews.author: Mohamad Tayyara

customer_reviews.title: Lovethe Samsung Book
customer_reviews.text: Love the Book! Light for travel, keyboard makes it easy to work on the go. It is fast, plenty of storage and compatible to Office!
customer_reviews.author: loree colon

customer_reviews.title: I like this computer very mutch!
customer_reviews.text: I was Japanese and sent this computer to Japan, but I arrived in only two days and I can make an environment that can be used in Japanese and I use it very comfortably. I could buy a computer that is hard to get in Japan at a low price. Practical operating speed with minimal volume. Beautiful display. You can increase storage capacity with MicroSD card. If you do not need it you can leave the keyboard with backlight doubles as the case. The S pen detects delicate changes in writing pressure without requiring a power supply. I am doing very well, I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Best alternative to Surface Pro so far on the market. I have been using it for almost thsee month now, no major issues. Heat control and battery life need improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Chenzhang

customer_reviews.title: S Pen round broken
customer_reviews.text: My S Pen was found broken from the point I cant fix it
customer_reviews.author: Nigel caruana

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my new tablet
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my new tablet. It takes excellent photos but is a little heavy to take around, but I did take a few photos on our cruise while sitting on the balcony.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Tablet Buyers Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE!!!! I wanna say fake advertising on Samsung’s behalf because although this is a Samsung Galaxy device, there is no access to Google Play apps! It is a Microsoft platform, using Windows 10. You can go online via the Microsoft platform and then to the Google Play online website but it will not allow a Google Play (Android) app to be downloaded! So I feel swindled because no where does it say this! You’d think that because it is a Samsung Galaxy device, it is a given that one can share their already owned Google Play apps to this device and buy more, but No, absolutely not!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Lance

customer_reviews.title: Replacement parts gouging is Samsung's new thing. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I actually really liked this machine. But is made in such a way that it can not be used with a protective cover and has NONE built in. Dropped and cracked screen. Spoke to several repair shops. All said the same thing. Samsung is charging $400 for a screen where Apple and Microsoft charge about $100 and it is the same across all their devices. They deserve less than one star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazinon

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Book 12" Touchscreen Tablet Computer, Intel Core 7th Gen i5-7200U 3.10GHz, 4GB RAM, 128GB SSD, AC WIFI, Bluetooth 4.1, USB Type-C, Windows 10
product_meta.description:
Capacity:i5-7200U | 4GB RAM | 128GB SSD | Windows 10 Home


Watch movies and TV shows anywhere on this 12-inch Samsung Galaxy Book 2-in-1 tablet. It has a Super AMOLED display that supports 4K resolution to replicate the movie theater experience, and its S Pen provides precision in creative projects. This Samsung Galaxy Book 2-in-1 tablet has a battery life of up to 10.5 hours.

Key Features:
Memory (RAM): 4GB
Storage Capacity: 128GB
Screen Size: 12 inches LED
Screen Type: Super AMOLED
Screen Resolution: 2160 x 1440
Processor: Intel 7th Generation Core i5
Operating System: Windows 10 Home
Voice Assistant Built-in Cortana
GPS Enabled Yes
Keyboard Included Yes
Rear-Facing Camera: 13 megapixels
Front-Facing Camera: 5 megapixels
Connectivity: 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac 2.4G+5GHz, VHT80 MIMO
Bluetooth Enabled: Yes
Headphone Jack Yes
Interface: USB Type C
Expandable Memory Compatibility: microSD
Stylus Included: Yes
Height: 11.45 inches
Width: 7.85 inches
Depth: 0.29 inches
Weight: 25.3 ounces
feature_bullets: 12" Full HD Plus (2160 x 1440) Touchscreen Display , Intel HD Graphics 620
4GB LPDDR3 SDRAM, 128GB SSD, No Optical Drive
Bluetooth 4.1, WiFi a/ac/b/g/n, 2 x USB Type-C, Via USB Type-C, 3.5mm Stereo (Headphone / Mic combo), 5 MP Front, 13 MP Rear with Auto Focus, Stylus Pen, Detachable Keyboard with Touchpad
Windows 10 ; 5070 mAh Battery, Up to 11 hours, Weight 1.66 pounds and Dimensions (inches) 11.47" x 7.87" x 0.29"
